title: "AI-driven biomarker predicts optimum length of treatment for prostate cancer"
excerpt: "A biomarker developed with digitalized pathology and artificial intelligence demonstrated it was able to identify which men treated with radiation for high-risk localized prostate cancer could be spared long-term hormone therapy and its potential side effects."
